intro_only_event_multi_rse_event/6901_13: So you’re not sure where to start, huh?
There’s a lot to do here on Pasio, after all...

Yup! Of course I’d like to have some battles, but
I also want to chat with other Trainers!

That’s a great idea! There are many ways to enjoy
your time here!

But if you have to choose one, why don’t you try
some three-on-three battles? They’re unique
to Pasio!

I’m so curious about them, but this would be my
first time in a team battle, so I don’t think
I’m ready...

Why don’t you start off by battling with people
you know from Hoenn, then?

You know each other well, which might make for
an interesting battle.

Oh, that’s a fantastic idea! Brendan, you’ll help me
with that, right?

I’ll get a team together, too, so we can battle
each other!

I’ll see who else I can round up from other places
while I’m at it!
intro_only_event_multi_rse_event/6801_13:
Lisia, have you learned anything from teaming up
with us?

You were so dazzling and dizzying, I think you’d
be able to show off your skills even more if you
two were in a contest together!

A contest, huh... I still have work to do as a
Champion, so I don’t think I’m ready for that
just yet.
I wouldn’t want to do a contest with Steven.

He’d just steal the spotlight! How could I get
everyone’s attention that way?

I wonder what it would look like if all three of us
joined forces in a contest!

If you’re that curious, why don’t we have a battle
to try it out?

If we all had a battle, we’d be able to
understand each other’s personalities better.
That’s a great idea! I think I’ll call it...

“Splendid! A Heart-Pounding Battle with
My Princes!”
intro_only_event_multi_rse_event/6802_13: I’m so glad I could team up with the two of you!
Please let me learn from you and how you battle!

I was watching how you were battling up until
now.

It looks like you’ve already figured out a battling
style that works for you!
I’m sure Drake feels the same way.

We must face our Pokémon with respect, deciding
when to be lenient and when to be strict. That is
how we continue our path together.

And even more importantly, you must do it with
a sincere heart!
I believe you already have that.
Wally, have confidence! We’re counting on you!
Yes, sir! Thank you very much!
intro_only_event_multi_rse_event/6803_13:
We’re doing a pretty good job of riding this wave
of victories. But I think we need something to get
even more pumped up!
Something to get pumped up? What do you mean?

To show off how well our team works together
and overwhelm our opponents, we should do a
name shout-out!
What do you mean by that?

I have ideas for what we could say, actually. 
Here, let me explain...
Oh, I see! That’s pretty cool!
Ready? Let’s give it a shot!
I’m Brawly, a big wave in fighting!

I’m Flannery, the one with a fiery passion
that burns!
I’m Roxanne, the rock-loving honor student!
I-I can’t do this anymore. It’s so embarrassing!
intro_only_event_multi_rse_event/6804_13: Ahaha! That was a fun battle!

We’re gonna keep battling all kinds of folks to
study their fighting technique and get
even stronger!

Yup! My bond with my Pokémon gets stronger
every time we battle!
What about you, Lucy? Do you feel stronger, too?

But it might be fun to see how long this string of
luck will last...
All right! Then let’s give it another go!

Yeah! I wanna see how far my bond with my
Pokémon can go!
intro_only_event_multi_rse_event/6805_13:
So you two have been battling on different teams
here on Pasio?
Yup! We want to make each other stronger!

So that’s why we’re battling separately! It’s a kind
of training for us!
I see. So it’s special that you’re teaming up today.
Are you sure it’s OK for me to join you?
Of course! You have a lot of things that we don’t!
We’re both happy that you teamed up with us!

Very well, I’ll join you in spirit so that we can
soar the skies together...
I’m going to fight with everything I have!
intro_only_event_multi_rse_event/6902_13:
I didn’t know that team battles could be so 
exciting! It was so much more fun than I thought
it would be!

Thanks to you all, I was able to enjoy a lot of
battles and meet a bunch of Trainers!

I’m glad you enjoyed it! We also got an
unexpected visitor!
Thanks, everyone! I had so much fun!

There are still many strong Trainers and Pokémon
here on Pasio for you to challenge!

But of course, there’s more to Pasio than
just battling.

How about we all go out for something nice
to eat?

What a great idea! But before that, since we’re all
here, why don’t we take a picture?

Yay, that would be amazing! Yes, please! Let’s 
take a picture and keep it to remember this day!
